name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Poll, Survey, Quiz & Form by Opinion Stage

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a powerful and easy to use poll, survey, quiz & form extension. Get started in minutes for free.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily create a Poll, Survey, Form, or Quiz to your website and embed it on your site. 

Don't have a site? run the tool from optimized landing pages on the Opinion Stage site. Share it with your social accounts and email list.

Main Poll Benefits:

* Poll your users to discover what they think about different topics. View basic poll results on the poll interface, and get advanced poll analytics in the Opinion Stage dashboard

* Engage your audience - a poll is one of the most engaging types of content. 

* Drive traffic from social networks to your poll - users are promoted to share their votes in social networks, driving traffic to your poll

* Run social profile based poll competitions & elections

* Design polls that perfectly fit your site - customize the fonts, sizes, and colors

* Easy poll creation - creating polls is an easy way to produce engaging and relevant content. Deploy your first polls in seconds and easily manage all your polls from a simple and intuitive dashboard


Main Quiz Benefits:

* Engage your audience with quizzes - quizzes are one of the most engaging types of content

* Drive traffic from social networks to your quiz - after completing the quiz, participants are prompted to share the quiz results, driving new traffic to your quiz

* Gain insights from quiz results

* Design the quiz so that it fits your site

* Easy quiz creation - creating a quiz is an easy way to produce engaging and relevant content. Create from scratch or based on one of the hundreds of templates

* Embed your quiz on your site or use the Opinion Stage quiz landing page

* Create different quiz types, such as personality quiz and trivia quiz


Main Survey and Form Benefits:

* Get more submissions with a visual and interactive Survey or Form

* Create surveys & forms that are optimized for viewing on all platforms - desktop, mobile & tablet

* Get advanced analytics on the survey & form submissions

* Select between a classic 1-page layout form and an interactive survey in which 1 questions is asked at a time

* Use skip/branch logic to personalize your survey by asking each user only the relevant questions

* Use many different open-ended and close-ended types of questions


Using Opinion Stage polls, quizzes, surveys, and forms you can boost engagement, drive traffic from social networks, gather leads, monetize your traffic, and discover opinions. Opinion Stage items are fully responsive and are perfectly viewed on desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.
 
For more information, go to our site: https://www.opinionstage.com
